item.title: Current buffer only mapping
item.description: If you want to set a mapping only for the current buffer in VIM, it’s super simple: just use the buffer special argument, like so for example: nnoremap <buffer> ,tip call InsertTipYamlFrontMatter() Learn more: :help :map-local
